nodes.text: Sector 47 was an area of space within the Endor system and above the Forest Moon of Endor. During the Battle of Endor in the Galactic Civil War, the Galactic Empire's Star Destroyers were located in Sector 47 and ambushed the Alliance Fleet. A Rebel Alliance Mon Calamari officer informed Admiral Gial Ackbar about the location of the Imperial vessels.
